import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FiArrowLeft } from "react-icons/fi"; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardText, Col, FormGroup, Input, Label } from "reactstrap"; export default function ShippingInfoPage(props){ const [checkedRadioS, setCheckedRadioS] = useState(true) const [checkedRadioF, setCheckedRadioF] = useState(false) const [previousPrice, setPreviousPrice] = useState(0) const shippingNavHandler = () => { props.setCustomerNav(false); props.setShippingNav(false); props.setPaymentNav(true); } const backSNavHandler = () => { props.setCustomerNav(true); props.setShippingNav(false); props.setPaymentNav(false); } const radioHandler=(mode,price) => { let totalPrice=props.totalPrice; console.log("total in price",props.totalPrice) if(mode == 'fast'){ setCheckedRadioF(true) setCheckedRadioS(false) totalPrice += price; setPreviousPrice(price) props.setTotalPrice(totalPrice) } else if(mode == 'free'){ setCheckedRadioF(false) setCheckedRadioS(true) totalPrice=props.totalPrice; props.setTotalPrice(totalPrice) } props.setTotalPrice(totalPrice); } return (
Jamy Larson Unit 2 Green Mount Retail Park Halifax HX1 5QN Tel: 0344 322 5931 Edit Address Add Address
{/* shipping method */}
radioHandler('free',0)} style={{padding:'0px', margin:'0px 8px 0px 0px'}}/>
Estimated 14-20 Days Shipping (Duties and Taxes may be due upon delivery)
radioHandler('fast',8)} style={{padding:'0px', margin:'0px 8px 0px 0px'}}/>
Estimated 2-5 Days Shipping (Duties and Taxes may be due upon delivery)
) }
